title: PRS Oberoi, veteran of Indian hospitality, passes away
description: In 2022, the Oberoi Hotels' patriarch, popularly known as 'Biki', had relinquished his positions as executive chairman of EIH Ltd and chairman of EIH Associated Hotels Limited.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
